item.title: OXY
item.description: score:20 Chances: Occidental Petroleum is investing in carbon-capture utilization and sequestration (CCUS), which could open new opportunities in reducing carbon emissions. The acquisition of Carbon Engineering positions Occidental Petroleum as a leader in carbon dioxide removal, potentially aligning with global efforts to combat climate change.
